hr.p: Been drawing some characters again, just keeping the muscles warm and a new sunday comic.

div.p: Buisy week AND weekend, so the sunday comic is from monday and two doodles :P I think I am going to render the mech though, but I hve to rework it a bit.

Its been a productive week, did four (one???) render and some doodles! As always I have also the sunday comic offering!
Added new art to Doodles , Sunday Comics and Art from Sep to Dec!
Here is all the new stuff!

br.p: The september pfp, heavily inspired by the style of Disco Elysium, defo mroe painterly than my usual style

This is the render (or renders, heh) of the sketch I uploaded some time ago. I did four variants because I felt like it, learnt a lot from old vhs anime screenshots of gundam. You can get these as prints on my Ko-Fi :P (if not available send me a mail!)

div.p: I made a collection of 30 robot knight tokens for use in VTT! You can get them on Itch.io and Roll20. I also have made some doodles and as always a sunday comic.
Added new art to Doodles , Sunday Comics and Art from Sep to Dec!
Here is all the new stuff!
This week I doodled a bunch of gals. Just keeping the anatomy and pose cells fresh. Giving them these shitty grapic tees was just a way to not be needing to use the design skills too.
Added new art to Doodles , Sunday Comics and Art from Sep to Dec!

With a week pause I have some more stuff, I am working on some potential sticker designs, and just did some misc art including the october pfp. because we skipped a week there are actually 2 sunday strips.

ul.li: Step outside and look at the sky for five minutes
Look at another object in the distance
Think about your change in perception
